description: T.1 Oak - 3-4m Lateral reduction on all sides and 2-3m reduction of height to suitable growth points.
decision_conditions: T.1 Oak - 2-3m Lateral reduction of lower limbs to suitable growth points and in line with the natural shape of the upper crown, crown lift to 5m from ground level all round and remove deadwood and epicormic growth.

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Proposal Description - This has been amended for clarity. Please confirm if you agree, or amend if you disagree with the following description: "Erection of a single storey rear extension and hip to gable rear dormer roof extension to facilitate loft conversion. Changes to ground floor side fenestrations."
